description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the kernel streaming wow thunk service driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38052):

1. Download and apply the update packages from the official Windows Update catalog for your respective Windows version.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- Multiple update packages are available for different Windows versions. Ensure to check the correct KB Article IDs for your build version:
  - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5040442
  - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: KB5040431
  - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: KB5040427
- For manual installation, download the update packages from:
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
  - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running a compatible version of Windows.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
